statements: UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET location='Rome' WHERE site_id=1;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET description='A UNESCO World Heritage Site' WHERE site_name='Taj Mahal';
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET location='Paris', description='A historic site in the heart of the city', historical_significance='Architectural marvel' WHERE site_id=1;

UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET date_established='1750-02-15', site_name='Ancient Ruins of Rome', location='Italy', historical_significance='Symbol of Roman Empire', description='Ruins of an ancient civilization' WHERE site_id=2;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET site_name = 'Ancient Temple', site_location = 'Historic City' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE monuments SET year_built = 1900, monument_location = 'Downtown' WHERE monument_id = 10;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET site_name='Ancient Temple', site_description='The oldest temple in the region' WHERE site_id=1;
UPDATE monuments SET year_built=1800, monument_location='City Center' WHERE monument_id=3;
UPDATE heritage_sites SET location='New Location' WHERE site_id=1;
UPDATE monuments SET year_built=1900, architect='New Architect' WHERE monument_id=2;
UPDATE heritage_sites SET site_name = 'New Site Name', description = 'Updated description' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE monuments SET architect = 'New Architect', year_built = 2022 WHERE monument_id = 2;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET site_name = 'Taj Mahal', location = 'Agra' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE monuments SET architect = 'Zaha Hadid', year_built = 2020 WHERE monument_id = 3;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET location = 'New Location', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE monuments SET year_built = 1800, architect = 'New Architect' WHERE monument_id = 5;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET location = 'New Location', country = 'New Country' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monuments SET year_built = 1800, description = 'Historical monument with significant cultural value' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE cultural_heritage_sites SET site_name='Taj Mahal', country='India' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE monuments SET description='An iconic symbol of love', year_built=1632, monument_name='Taj Mahal' WHERE id=1;
